channel.title: Whonix Gateway crashing
channel.description:
Hey! first of all I just want to say a huge thanks for the time you've put into developing Whonix.. its become invaluable to me and my work and i am very grateful.
Over the last few days the gateway keeps crashing as seen in the attached image. i've tried re-installing the gateway but I get the same result. do you know how i might go about fixing the issue? it just stays on this screen...
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vbheZxV.png[/img]

item.title: Whonix Gateway crashing
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Terminal-only gateway? 128 MB RAM?

If so, maybe it’s this issue:
https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,1209

Try this workaround:
https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,1209.msg8084.html#msg8084

Read full topic
